about_me:
I am Frontend Developer with more than 2 years of commercial experience in developing Web applications and Web sites in Vue.
I have been interested in programming since my master's studies, when I created my first project using HTML, CSS and JS. Later, I smoothly moved on to learning React and created my first application.
I am eager to learn. Outside of work, I try to regularly take courses on platforms such as Udemy and listen to podcasts related to the IT industry.
